1.0.name: wordpress/facebook-page-photo-gallery
1.0.description:
This Plugin fetches a Facebook Page Photo Album as a JSON object and uses Fancybox to render the gallery in wordpress It is specifically for public photos particularly those belonging to a Facebook Page if you would like to show Photos and albums belonging to users and friends then consider Facebook Walleria Plugin. You do not need special permissions, just the album ID and boom!

Version 2.0 was completely rewritten and makes use of wordpress shortcodes.

How to use

  • In your post just add the following [fbphotos id=x] where x is the album ID
  • To specify number of photos to show use [fbphotos id=x limit=y] where y is the number to be shown
  • To use in your template pages in theme development you can call the following function **do_shortcode('fbphotos').

Pro Features

If you want to showcase any private a
